thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Maria Calibo-Sales

author: Maria Calibo-Sales
title: Maria Calibo-Sales
text:
The ServCorp services are ideal for Start Ups and SMEs to have the professional presence and admin support they need, so they can take care of business.
We have used the ServCorp offices to host client meetings and work with our global team in 10 cities across 4 countries, and in every single one the local teams have been wonderful. Each office location have been in beautiful premises with breathtaking views, a real WOW-factor with our clients.
We absolutely recommend ServCorp services. They have been fantastic partners to our business.
